DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the accuracy of FRC and airway resistance calculate values of Spircare device as compared to the conventional body plethysmograph in healthy adults and patients with obstructive and restrictive pulmonary diseases/disorders.
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy of Spircare Device as Compared to the Conventional Plethysmograph
